AuthorName.Title: [PDF] Automated Code Fix Suggestions for Accessibility Issues in Mobile Apps
AuthorName.Content: F Mehralian, T Barik, J Nichols, A Swearngin - arXiv preprint ;arXiv:2408.03827, 2024Accessibility is crucial for inclusive app usability, yet developers often struggle to identify and fix app accessibility issues due to a lack of awareness, expertise, and inadequate tools. Current accessibility testing tools can identify accessibility issues but may not always provide guidance on how to address them. We introduce FixAlly, an automated tool designed to suggest source code fixes for accessibility issues detected by automated accessibility scanners.
